title: Best of Loading Bay Records
description:
Best of Loading Bay Records

1980&#039;s & 90&#039;s UK Hi-NRG label whose tagline was "Purveyors Of Fine Vinyl."
Specialists in Hi-NRG/Eurodance.

This is from my collection - some of the best high energy ever made from the late 1980&#039;s through the early 1990&#039;s.

Loading Bay Records was the personal project of Birmingham&#039;s Duncan "Funky Dunc" Finlayson, who started the label in 1989. Duncan&#039;s passion for hi-energy dance music, and his enthusiasm as a businessman, ensured that the label would be a success. He was great fun to work with.

With licensed tracks from Europe, the USA and Canada, Loading Bay RecordsÃƒÂ¢?? catalogue reflected Duncan&#039;s taste for the best in hi-energy, emotionally charged productions, and music which was purely for fun.

Duncan&#039;s tragic death in November 1996 saw the close of Loading Bay Records. Now, ten years on, Load This! contains a selection of some of the best from Loading Bay Hi-NRG and Loading Bay Classics, plus some new remixes. These tracks are also included in my collection here.
